item.title: [Malware Analysis] Is This Really Free to Watch? RedLine InfoStealer
item.description: You have become a victim of piracy. Although GitHub promotes an open-source culture where code can be publicly reviewed, this doesn’t mean it’s 100% safe.

item.title: [2023H1 Chat] Hey! I'm Back
item.description: After graduating, I started my corporate life, then got conscripted for four months of military service. Not long after returning to the company, I went for another month of training. A year really passes by in the blink of an eye.

item.title: [NSYSU Security Club] Intranet Penetration
item.description: Long time no club session - this time MacacaHub active member @Arikoi talks about intranet penetration. Listening through the whole session, I realized I’m unfamiliar with too many concepts, so I’ll try to organize the process. Please point out any errors!

item.title: [DEVCORE @HITCON2021] Wargame Web Challenge
item.description: Waaah I really wanted to get MASTER OF WEBSEC, but my skills wouldn’t allow me to challenge that title QQ This is my second time attending HITCON, and the on-site activities were really too many to cover :D
